channel.title: I'm new
channel.description:
I'm new to making private servers =/.
I have a couple questions. I was looking on how to make an own custom downloadable client, and it said I had to find this JAVAC file in my BIN folder. I can't find that. On top of that it says I need JDK5 or 6, which I downloaded D:. Does it mean update 5 or 6? One more thing, could I make a private server out of this? It was a really good one, but the guys hard drive crashed, and I want to edit it around a little bit. Put custom things and stuff, but I'm new to this whole thing. It wasn't a custom source, but a lot of servers weren't really made like this. I liked it, though, so I want to build on it. Please help if you know. Here's a pic:http://img43.imageshack.us/i/newbitmapimage3g.png/ and here's another http://img43.imageshack.us/i/newbitmapimage3g.png/
here's where I got the guide how to make the client (I think this is how to make the your own custom client) http://www.techspot.com/vb/all/windows/t-102247-How-to-make-your-own-runescape-private-server.html
If that's not it, I was looking for something where I could change the skins, and make it compatible with the new server. I'm so clueless :(
SORRY IF POSTING LINKS IS ADVERTISING

item.title: I'm new
item.dc:creator: @Lahdeedah2 Lahdeedah2
item.description:
@Lahdeedah2 wrote:

I see. It probably will say I don’t have JDK5 or JDK6. I made a path of whatever it’s called, and ran cmd. I then ran javac, but that didn’t work. Also, could I make my own server with just a client?

Edit:
I have a Verizon Wireless Modem…I don’t have to do the port forwarding, right?

Read full topic

item.title: I'm new
item.dc:creator: @Jddogg9 Jddogg9
item.description:
@Jddogg9 wrote:

if your new with coding, i suggest you use a source like… figment scape, or any other servers that have a lot of glitches in them… so you can learn how to “fix” them.

and… just look at other topics on “server help” or “server guides” and after a while you will get use to java.

Read full topic

item.title: I'm new

I’m new to making private servers =/.

I have a couple questions. I was looking on how to make an own custom downloadable client, and it said I had to find this JAVAC file in my BIN folder. I can’t find that.
